description:
Are you ready for your close up? (Yes!)

This course will teach you how to get press coverage for your business, brand or blog from local, regional and national media outlets.

Press coverage can be invaluable for growing your business, increasing brand awareness and driving sales, and the best part is that unlike advertising, it's completely free. 

In a series of eight video modules, I'll take you through the pitching process step by step, showing you the exact process I've used to land stories in the Wall Street Journal, ABC News, the Huffington Post and hundreds of local publications. 

The course materials include more than three hours of video content, printable downloads and worksheets to help you work through each module, and direct access to me via email for any additional questions.
title: Get Major Media Coverage! Pitching Your Brand to the Press
